__e: Mm, how did you know that's exactly what I needed right now?
You knew she was there, didn't you?
Well, if you knew he set me up, then where the hell you been all day?
You knew it was me but you didn't say anything?
You knew I was here and you didn't say anything either.
I don't know, shirley. How did you figure I wasn't?
"and you knew better and you did nothing."
You knew I had this- this-whatever this is- and you never said anything.
If you knew you'd be late, why didn't you call?
Did you know that your the most beautiful person ever?
All along, you knew you'd died.
You found a child you didn't know you had and stole its money too?
And this is the daughter of the son you didn't know you had?
You didn't realize you were busy until you showed up here? Yeah.
If you knew of such a plan, why didn't you report it to me?
And this is the daughter of the son you didn't know you had?
And you knew about this place because... came here on a date once.
But then you already knew that, didn't you?
I don't know why, but I never told anyone... but you, just now.
While all this time, you already knew.
Did you know what he was gonna do?
You don't know what was really going on, I mean, it was...
Well, why would you know the right thing and your father and I not know?
You knew what he did and you said nothing.
But how? How did you know where to find me?
Perhaps, by the time you thought of it, you didn't know where to reach me?
I suppose I don't need to ask how you knew where to find me.
You said you didn't know where she went.
Why don't you tell me how you knew where the boy was?
That's how you knew where to go.
You knew it and you never told me?
But then you did know, and you didn't mention it, and then, what, you just slept with him again?
All this time, you knew and you didn't tell me.
You knew it and you never told me?
All this time, you knew and you didn't tell me.
But then you did know, and you didn't mention it, and then, what, you just slept with him again?
